description: Adds one or more items to an Items dataset. For more information see Importing items individually.

parameters.name: datasetArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Items dataset you are adding the item or items to.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: A list of item data. (dict) --- Represents item metadata added to an Items dataset using the PutItems API. For more information see Importing items individually. The ID associated with the item. properties (string) --- A string map of item-specific metadata. Each element in the map consists of a key-value pair. For example, {"numberOfRatings": "12"}. The keys use camel case names that match the fields in the schema for the Items dataset. In the previous example, the numberOfRatings matches the --NUMBER_OF_RATINGS' field defined in the Items schema. For categorical string data, to include multiple categories for a single item, separate each category with a pipe separator ( |). For example, \"Horror|Action\".

nested_params.name: itemId
nested_params.description: The ID associated with the item.

nested_params.name: properties
nested_params.description: A string map of item-specific metadata. Each element in the map consists of a key-value pair. For example, {"numberOfRatings": "12"}. The keys use camel case names that match the fields in the schema for the Items dataset. In the previous example, the numberOfRatings matches the --NUMBER_OF_RATINGS' field defined in the Items schema. For categorical string data, to include multiple categories for a single item, separate each category with a pipe separator ( |). For example, \"Horror|Action\".
